channel.title: [508]: Almost Perfect PickPocketing
channel.description:
Took me a couple hours to create this thieving system, and another hour adding some other NPC's to PickPocket, rather than just having men and women to PickPocket.
Features of it:
[ul][li]PickPockets when you reach the NPC, not straight when you click it.[/li] [li]You face the NPC while walking, a lot of 508's do not have that.[/li] [li]The random chance of being stunned or not, is calculated through what your thieving level is. So for example if you PickPocketed a guard, and you were 40 thieving, you would have a lot less chance of succeeding than if you had 80 thieving.[/li] [li]Perfect stunning & Hitting sounds when you fail to PickPocket the target NPC.[/li] [li]You cannot move when stunned.[/li] [li]If you try and walk while stunned, it will play the sound from RuneScape, and it will send the message "You are stunned!".[/li] [li]The NPC will say the appropriate text when you fail to pickpocket it. Most NPC's will say "What do you think you're doing?!", whereas farmers will say "Blimey mate what're you doin' in me pockets?", which is similar to RuneScape, I can't test what they say, as I am not a Member at this time (Since nearly all my RuneScape accounts were hacked).[/li] [li]You cannot mass PickPocket.[/li][/ul]
Video:
http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=2q9yv5c&s=5
Picture:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/pp.jpg[/img]

item.title: [508]: Almost Perfect PickPocketing
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:23, topic:250927”]posting proof meow.

Here u r[/quote]

Haha, thats a fail.

Pickpocketing has two parts. The attempt, and the Success/Fail. Yours does it in one, so it either fails, or gives money when you succeed, straight away.

Plus if you fail with your PickPocketing, There is no sound, the NPC doesn’t do It’s attacking emote, the NPC doesn’t face you, and it doesn’t say It’s text, eg. “What do you think you’re doing?!”.

Owned.

Read full topic

item.title: [508]: Almost Perfect PickPocketing
item.dc:creator: @rsdragonboy rsdragonboy
item.description:
@rsdragonboy wrote:

[quote=“primadude, post:16, topic:250927”][quote author=adamp40 link=topic=331076.msg2586211#msg2586211 date=1229532537]

You are mistaken. There is Low definition, and High definition. Not two seperate positions on time of the cache.

what i am trying to say is that the High Def WideScreen Version is 508 and then small normal screen like this:

pp.jpg763×497

is 503
[/quote]

No it isn’t. There is 508 Hd, and 508 Ld.
Hd is for people who have good enough graphics cards, and good enough RAM, to handle it.
Ld is for anyone.[/quote]
yep this lowd but 508 it is equal rune cape but correct that you can special hd use in moparscape client. but if you look at to other client have you also client but who is in lowd nevertheless in fullscreen

Read full topic
